name: Gone Home Demake (VOS)
description:
This is a text adventure demake of Gone Home.

If you haven't played Gone Home already (of which this is a demake) PLEASE GO BUY/PLAY GONE HOME IMMEDIATELY.

I made this because I wanted to experiment with storytelling through text-based game mechanics, and also to try making something that looks like a DOS based computer console.

This was made in Unity with the help of Joshua McGrath's terrific 'Tidy Text Adventures' plugin.

If you accidentally log yourself out, the main password is 'scully' ;)
